title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Fenix Simulations A320 - prepping the aircraft for a flight
description:
In this video we will have a look at how to prepare the Fenix Simulations A320 from scratch: start the airplane with all systems off. We will start with starting up several systems and then use the FMC and the Flypad to make sure we are ready to go. Steps which we will discuss are: adding a flight plan, loading the aircraft, setting up the performance setting and much more.

0:00 title screen
0:10 introduction
1:28 start the aircraft systems: external power, battery, IRS calibration etc.
5:20 FMC: reviewing the cargo, passengers and fuel options
6:55 Flypad: fuel, passengers and cargo settings
10:40 Flypad: importing the flight plan: Simbrief and Navigraph integration
15:30 Flypad: calculate the V1, Vr and V2 settings
17:20 FMC: configuring the init settings and performance settings
25:37 FMC: validating the flight plan and adding the SID
31:55 Switching on the lights
32:14 Starting the engines
34:41 Removing all group services equipment
35:20 Call pushback truck
